alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas and southern Pueblo Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Salt Creek, or 17 miles south of Pueblo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
